overview:
Ron is focused on sourcing and executing investments across a variety of sectors, including software-as-a-service, B2B/B2C internet and digital media. He is currently a Board Observer at MyWebGrocer.

Prior to joining Stripes Group, Ron co-founded Endgame Capital, LLC, which focuses on land investment and development in South Carolina. While there, he worked on developing and marketing a planned 60-unit town home / condominium project. Previously, he was an investment banker in the Mergers & Acquisitions group at Citigroup Global Markets, where he worked on providing strategic advisory on leveraged buyouts, mergers, acquisitions and recapitalizations to a wide array of clients, including Fortune 50 companies.
